content: unwind with the adagio throw a relaxing crochet pattern featuring a fun and rhythmic stitch repeat this design combines two yarns including mandala yarn with color changes that make every project uniquely yours finished with playful pompoms along the top and bottom this blanket adds a touch of charm to any space easy to follow the pattern comes with a detailed video tutorial to guide you every step of the way find the free pattern on my blog 1 a kit with lion brand is available 2 it comes with all the yarn needed to make your throw and a free copy of the pdf digital download you can also customize your yarn colors a full video tutorial is also available 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-adagio-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/4tcib 3 https //youtu be/zvftxpoiwqu
